name: RandomUser.Swift
summary: A nifty RandomUser generator for Swift
description:
A nifty RandomUser generator for Swift
RandomUser_Swift aims to provider an easy to use API for generating random
user model objects in a way that integrates well with your existing model graph.

In a few lines you can generate a new user with random name, age and profile picture.
Locations, languages and Genders are not fully supported but will be coming soon.
